Translations.Text: This worldly life est ne plur than vanity lud while abode Hereafter est efektiv life ili nur kon
When ili rajd sxip ili implore DI devoting their prayers Him! as baldaux as Li sav them bord ili revert al idolatry
Let them disbelieve ki ni don them let them gxu temporarily; ili do gxi surely trov out
Ili ne seg ni hav establ Sankt Sanctuary ni far secure while all around them popol est konstant dangxer? Ili ankoraux kred en falsehood Would reject di blessings
Who evil than unu fabricates mensog est atribu them DI rejects truth when gxi ven him? est Infer ne just retribution disbelievers
As por those strive en our kauxz ni surely direkt them our paths! plej assuredly DI est kun des pi
